ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock=="0") {
	//简介
	novelCover = java.getString("$.novelCover");
	let option = {"headers": {"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}};
	novelCover = novelCover+","+JSON.stringify(option);
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|[,]/g,"🏷️");
	mainview = String(java.getString("$.mainview")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"作品视角：");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist")).replace(/主角：$/,"");
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar")).replace(/配角：$/,"");
	other = String(java.getString("$.other")).replace(/其它：$/,"");
	novelIntroShort = String(java.getString("$.novelIntroShort")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"一句话简介：");
	novelIntro1 = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/.*立意[:]/,"立意：");
	commentcount = String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\D/,"").replace(/^(?=\S)/,"总书评数：");
	novelbefavoritedcount = String(java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"当前被收藏数：");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/\s*立意[:].*/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"https://www.jjwxc.net/onebook.php?novelid=");
	codeUrl = java.getString("$.codeUrl");
	A = novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+novelIntro1+"\n"+commentcount+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro+"\n‎\n"+"【"+novelId+"】"+"\n"+"【"+codeUrl+"】"
	//评论
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId).replace(/\D+/g,"");
	commentall = /1/.test(extend)?JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)):"";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	if(cstate=="200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = "";
		for(i=0; i<cbody.length; i++) {
			let P = cbody[i];
			let foldlingauthor = P.foldlingauthor;
			let commentbody = P.commentbody;
			let pchapterid = P.chapterid;
			let commentmark = P.commentmark;
			let vip_chapter_icon = P.vip_chapter_icon;
			let subscriptionicon = P.subscriptionicon;
			let agreenum = P.agreenum;
			let ip_pos = P.ip_pos;
			let commentdate = P.commentdate;
			subscriptionicon = subscriptionicon==""?"":"　"+subscriptionicon;
			agreenum = agreenum=="0"?"":"👍【"+agreenum+"】　";
			commentL+="•——————•——————•"+"\n"+"👤"+foldlingauthor+subscriptionicon+"　"+"打分："+commentmark+"　"+"所评章节："+pchapterid+vip_chapter_icon+"\n"+commentbody+"\n"+agreenum+"来自"+ip_pos+"　发表时间："+commentdate+"\n"
			};
		} else {
		commentL = ""
		};
	A+"\n‎\n"+commentL
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message")
	}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
在“设置书籍变量”时填1，将开启webview（默认关闭）
“登录后”看不了已购买的VIP章节→开启webview→刷新目录→刷新正文→可看已购买的VIP章节
webview仅针对填写了书籍变量的书，其他书想要开启webview需再次填写

<js>
tags = String(java.getString("$.data.bookInfo.tags"));
tags = tags.replace(/^(?=\S)|\n|[-]/g,"🏷️");
score = java.getString("$.data.bookInfo.score");
score = score=="0"?"少于10人评价":"好评率："+score*10+"%";
scorerCount = java.getString("$.data.bookInfo.scorerCount");
scorerCount = scorerCount < 10?"":"　"+"总"+scorerCount+"个评分";
introduction = java.getString("$.data.bookInfo.introduction");
"\t"+tags+"\n"+score+scorerCount+"\n‎\n"+introduction
</js>

score+" "+updateAt
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
siteName = java.get("sitename");
bookPage = java.get("bookpage");
phonePage = java.get("phonepage");
comment = JSON.parse(result);
commentlist = comment.data.comments;
commentcontent = "";
for(i=0; i<commentlist.length; i++) {
	let A = commentlist[i];
	let content = A.content;
	let updateAt = A.updateAt.replace(/[.]\d{3}Z/,"").replace(/T/," ");
	let score = A.score;
	let userName = A.createrId.userName
	let praiseCount = A.praiseCount
	commentcontent+="•——————•——————•"+"\n"+"👤"+userName+"　"+"编辑于"+updateAt+"　"+"🌸".repeat(score)+"\n"+content+"\n"+"👍"+"【"+praiseCount+"】"+"\n"
	}
"\t"+"【"+siteName+"】"+"\n"+"【"+bookPage+"】"+"\n"+"【"+phonePage+"】"+"\n"+commentcontent
</js>

<js>

phonePage = java.getString("$.data.bookSource[0].phonePage");
java.put("sitename",siteName);

java.put("phonepage",phonePage);
bookId = java.getString("$.data.bookInfo._id");
url = "https://api.yousuu.com/api/book/"+bookId+"/comment?type=&page=1&t="+Date.now();

pagesize = A.data.comments.length;
page = Math.floor(A.data.total/pagesize)||1;
list = []
for(i=0; i<page; i++) {
	index = Number(i)+1
	list.push({
		"name": "书评 第"+index+"页",
		"url": "/api/book/"+bookId+"/comment?type=&page="+index+"&t="+Date.now()
		})	
	}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
id = baseUrl.match(/\d+/);
url = "https://www.doufuyuedu.com/novel/getChapter/"+id;
cookie = cookie.getCookie(url);
token = String(cookie).replace(/XSRF\-TOKEN=|;.*/g,"");
option = {
	"method": "POST",
	"headers": {
		"accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
		"accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate, br",
		"accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,zh-TW;q=0.8",
		"referer": baseUrl,
		"Cookie": cookie,
		"x-csrf-token": token
		}
	};
java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))
</js>
$.content
